data.body: I cannot be of any help with regard to the ribbons, but others might if you post what _you_ did first :-)
I am trying to create a twisted ribbon, something like a ribbon when wing is blowing on it. So the ribbon is almost fixed, feels like flying.

In fact, I have uploaded my files here :

http://www.e-novative.ca/ribbon/

Hope someone could help me.

Thanks
so THREE.Ribbon doesnt exist anymore in Threejs, what is the alternative ?
@omarojo did you find the answer? also wondering what to use instead. thanks
